name: Noah and The Quest to Turn on The Light
name_original: Noah and The Quest to Turn on The Light
description:
Noah and The Quest to Turn on The Light is a personal game about dependency on external validation and how that dependency affects creators.

Join The Quest by following development on Twitter, or on the development blog.

Development is currently on pause. I know where I want this project to go now, but I'm committed to other projects. The Light was intended to get me out of a bad creative block and depression, which it did. I'm making things again. <3
